proposal: #20 - Subscan | Infrastructure Costs of Subscan for Polkadot & Westend & Rococo & Statemint & Rockmine Networks (from July to December 2022)
rationale: This proposal aims to cover infrastructure costs for Subscan.
details: Subscan is essential block explorer and analytics tool for the Polkadot network, providing valuable insights to the Polkadot community, so that's why support them with our AYE.

proposal: #224 - [Fix 214] Further decentralize collator set on Kusama system chains
rationale: This referendum aims to fix previous referendum #214 and further decentralize collator set on Kusama system chains.
details: We support this referendum, because decentralized collator set of system chains on Kusama is what we desire.

rationale: This propoasl aims to fund new Audits for Kusama treasury.
details: Kusama treasury is under pressure, so these audits can help decentralize and improve the auditing process.

proposal: #220 - RMRKv2 Integration in KodaDot - Kusama's NFT Infrastructure
rationale: This proposal aims to fill the gap left by RMRK's focus on EVM and maintain a sustainable, inclusive platform for NFT trading within the Kusama network.
details: We support this proposal to integrate RMRKv2 into their inclusive NFT marketplace, because we think is crucial for saving Kusama NFTs and generating market demand.

rationale: This proposal is to Register xcCFG as an XC-20.
details: Adding more parachain native tokens such as CFG from Centrifuge into Moonbeam as XC-20 tokens improve the multichain spirit of Polkadot.

rationale: By that referendum approved, 2,22M ASTR will be added to the Omnipool with 5% weight cap.
details: Adding new Polkadot native assets such as GLMR or ASTR is super important for the HydraDX Omnipool adoption, so that's we supported this referendum.

proposal: #48 - Mint 20M HDX & launch Hydrated Farms with DOT LM
rationale: This referendum aims to kick off HydraDXâ€™s Liquidity Mining programme by creating DOT LM Yield farm and provide it with 20M HDX liquidity
details: We can finally see the Liquidity Mining programme at the HydraDX Omnipool, so that's we are super excited by that and of course we voted AYE on this.

proposal: #35 - CP53(GI): Listing CFG in HydraDX Omnipool & seeding initial liquidity
rationale: This referendum will enable listing EFG token in HydraDX Omnipool and seeding the initial liquidity.
details: Adding new Polkadot native assets such as CFG is super important for the HydraDX Omnipool liquidity and further adoption, so that's we supported this referendum.
